meanings.sent1: She enjoys diademing her hair with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent2: The queen was diademing her crown before the royal ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was diademing her teddy bear with tiny toy crowns.
meanings.sent4: The artist diademing the statue with precious gems brought it to life.
meanings.sent5: The sun diademing the sky with golden hues at sunset was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The act of placing a diadem on someone's head.
meanings.sent1: During the coronation, the diademing of the queen was a grand moment.
meanings.sent2: The diademing of the princess at the ball was a symbol of royalty.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful diademing of a toy crown on its head amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The diademing of stars in the night sky created a celestial crown above.
meanings.sent5: The diademing of the mountain peaks with snow made them look majestic.
